name: Paragon AI
headline: Turns your sales calls into CRM data, automatically.
description: Paragon AI is a tool for sales representatives which automatically turns call recordings into structured information that directly updates the CRM. Instead of spending hours going over call recordings to pull out key information to populate the CRM, sales representatives can focus their time doing what they do best and sales leaders can rest assured that pipeline data is up to date.
tags: industry:saas; industry:b2b; industry:productivity; industry:sales; industry:ai; location:san-francisco-bay-area

founders.name: Max Lu, Founder
founders.description: After spending several years scaling the tech and product org as engineer #1 at a YC unicorn, Max (CEO) built out revenue operations as an early employee at another hypergrowth YC company where he experienced the sales team‚Äôs bemoaning of administrative work firsthand as he chased them down to update Salesforce. All the while, he personally experienced the pain of producing forecasts with their inevitably incomplete CRM data. Pilot AI is the solution that sales and leadership wished for.

[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65fb60dc15b4e5383b001b6e_Logo%20Dark.png)](https://paragon.ai/<#>)[Home](https://paragon.ai/</>)[Pricing](https://paragon.ai/</pricing>)[Product](https://paragon.ai/<#features>)[About](https://paragon.ai/</about>)
# No more searching through transcripts and typing up notes. Get back to closing.
### Automatically turn every one of your sales calls into detailed notes and structured data that syncs directly to your CRM.
Your calls speak for themselves.
Book a Demo
Please enter a valid email address.
√ó
## Trusted by high performing sales teams at
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/6607259d305738aebaf1f38e_Customers.png)
PARAGON AI
## How it works
Use cutting edge AI to automatically update and populate your CRM directly from your sales calls.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65f5147e7eeac29dc692116c_Group%2013.png)
CRM AUTOPILOT
## Paragon AI doesn‚Äôt just record your calls, it understands them. 
More than that, Paragon AI understands how much you would rather be out selling than updating your CRM. So, get back out there and sell - let Paragon AI handle the record keeping.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/660320d694f1ce31aeed70a1_Group%2044.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65f505a2669504f31fad786f_Summ.svg)
CONTEXT
## Summarization
See what happened in every call captured in just a few sentences. Quickly get a context of the call as well as important points that were discussed.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65f505a2669504f31fad7855_datapoint.svg)
DATA POINTS
## Custom Fields (Datapoints)
Let Paragon AI fill out the custom field in your CRM by turning the sales conversation into data points. What is the customer's budget? Who is the decision maker? When are they looking to buy?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65f505a2669504f31fad7855_datapoint.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65f505a2669504f31fad7879_qA.svg)
Q & A
## Questions & Answers
Capture every question that your sales rep asked on the call. Capture every answer the prospect gave. Let your prospect talk, Paragon AI makes sure to write down just the important points.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65f505a2669504f31fad7864_callnotes.svg)
DETAILS
## Call Notes
Sometimes your prospect will share details that are important, even if you didn't ask! Paragon AI makes sure these are captured too.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65f505a2669504f31fad7813/65f505a2669504f31fad7870_NOTES.svg)
## Want to see Paragon AI in action? Request a demo today.
Book a Demo

generated_description:
**Paragon AI: Simplifying Sales Efficiency**

Founded in 2022 and part of Y Combinator's Batch S22, Paragon AI is a San Francisco-based startup that's laser-focused on enhancing the productivity of sales representatives. Their mission? To automatically transform sales call recordings into structured CRM data. This innovation allows sales reps to ditch mind-numbing tasks like sifting through call transcripts and data entry‚Äîessentially freeing them up to do what they do best: selling.

Paragon AI works by leveraging cutting-edge artificial intelligence technology. It listens to sales calls and directly populates CRM systems with critical information, ensuring that data remains current and actionable. This not only streamlines the workflow for sales teams but also gives sales leaders confidence that their pipeline data is up-to-date.

Here‚Äôs how it operates:

1. **Automatic Note-taking**: Paragon AI summarizes call content into concise notes, capturing the essence of discussions without any manual effort.
2. **Data Points**: It extracts vital details such as customer budget, decision-makers, and timelines, filling out custom fields in the CRM with ease.
3. **Q&A Capture**: The tool records questions posed by the sales rep and answers from the prospective client, making sure that every relevant detail is documented.
4. **Additional Insights**: It also collects call notes that might not have been solicited but are still invaluable for follow-ups and relationship building.

With a small team of just three, including notable Group Partner Michael Seibel, Paragon AI is already making waves in the B2B SaaS landscape, tagged with keywords that tell you exactly who they are: 'saas', 'b2b', 'productivity', 'sales', and 'ai'.

In a world where time is money, Paragon AI cuts down the bureaucratic burden of sales processes, letting teams concentrate on closing deals rather than updating records. 

If you‚Äôre intrigued, you can visit their website at [paragon.ai](https://paragon.ai) to see their innovative product in action. They're on a mission to ensure that sales calls speak volumes‚Äîliterally‚Äîand it's high time the industry caught up.
